JOB DESCRIPTION: Key responsibilities will include:     Design and implement embedded network stack for LPRF devices. Implementation will consist of open source projects and greenfield development    Review code and design    Analyze issues to enhance stability and efficiency    Interface with hardware designer    Basic Qualifications    Bachelor in computer science, or equivalent    Proven experience within embedded development    Excellent programming skills in C language    Knowledge of ARM and 8051 assembly    Proven experience with preemptive, multitasking operating systems (Contiki, RiotOS and similar)    Solid understanding of multiparty communication systems (IP, GSM, etc)    Excellent knowledge of coding techniques and hardware subsystems    Preferred Qualifications   Demonstrated ability for independent software development (ie through open source projects)    Knowledge of professional software engineering practices & best practices for software development life cycle (coding standards, code review, source control management, different stages of testing and building projects)    Ability to take a project from initial planning to production ready state     Qualification:-   Graduate/Post Graduate
FUNCTIONAL AREA: IT Software - Embedded, EDA, VLSI, ASIC, Chip Design
